data.message: I found the love of my life my birth father and so much more... Thanks Facebook!

replies.message: We love to hear interesting stories like yours and hear more about your experience with Facebook, Kelly! If you’re interested in submitting your story to Facebook Stories, you can do so at: http://www.facebookstories.com/yourstory. In the meantime, we are glad you're a part of our Facebook community and hope there's many more happy experiences to come! -Rose
